tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    date DATE,
    congestion_level VARCHAR(50),
    average_speed FLOAT,
    weather_conditions VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    date DATE,
    traffic_intensity INT,
    congestion_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE route_info (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    starting_point VARCHAR(100),
    destination VARCHAR(100),
    distance FLOAT,
    average_speed INT
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    traffic_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    traffic_density INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE congestion_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    congestion_level VARCHAR(50),
    congestion_start TIMESTAMP,
    congestion_end TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE route_planning (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    recommended_speed INT,
    estimated_travel_time INTERVAL,
    recommended_route TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Route (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_location VARCHAR(255),
  end_location VARCHAR(255),
  distance FLOAT,
  traffic_congestion_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficEvent (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_description TEXT,
  event_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE HistoricalData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  congestion_level INT,
  weather_condition VARCHAR(50),
  temperature FLOAT,
  event_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
